explains: adj. 流动的；平滑的；上涨的
v. 流动；起源；上涨（flow 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: flowing pressure 流动压力；动水压力；自凉力
flowing well 自喷井；自流井
flowing concrete 连混凝土；流动混凝土

sentences.en: This can prevent air from flowing freely to the lungs.
sentences.cn: 这可以防止空气任意流入肺部。

sentences.en: His handwriting, from earliest young manhood, was flowing and graceful.
sentences.cn: 从他刚刚成年时起，他的书法就流畅而优美。

sentences.en: All flowing water, though it appears to be uniform, is actually divided into extensive inner surfaces, or layers, moving against one another.
sentences.cn: 所有流水尽管看起来是一样的，实际上是分成了大量相互碰撞的内在表层。
